metadata.title: CVE-2021-25635 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in LibreOffice, where it improperly validated signatures for algorithmsthat were not verified. This flaw leads to LibreOffice presenting a valid signature whenthe validity of the signature was not verified.  The highest threat from this vulnerabilityis to confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
